choose_game_rule:
Please choose a game mode [1-2]:
1.California mode
2.Standard mode
choose_language_prompt:
Please choose a language [1-4]:
1. English
2. 简体中文
3. 繁體中文
first_round_prompt:
Please enter [1-4]:
1.Start Game
2.Read Rules
3.Exit Game
4.Switch Language
pair_plus_round_prompt:
Would you like to place a Pair Plus bet? [1-3]:
1.Place Pair Plus
2.Skip Pair Plus
3.Exit Game
another_round_prompt:
Would you like to play another round? [1-3]
1.Play Again!
2.Switch Game Mode
3.Exit Game
exit_prompt: Thank you for playing Three Card Poker, hope to see you again~~~
press_enter_to_exit: Please press Enter again to exit...
file_not_found_error_prompt: File not found, please check if the path is correct!
player_already_cheated: ⚠️ Warning: You have already used the cheat, it cannot be used again! ⚠️
player_balance_already_high_enough: Your balance is already higher than the cheat amount, no need to cheat!
user_choice_not_in_options_prompt: Your input is invalid! Please check your input!
insufficient_balance_prompt: Your balance is below $$${limit}, game over!
int_input_not_in_legal_range_error_promp: Input range must be between $$${min} and $$${max}!
too_many_ante_tries_prompt: You have entered invalid input multiple times, returning to main menu!
too_many_pair_plus_tries_prompt: You have entered invalid input multiple times, skipping Pair Plus bet phase!
has_placed_ante_prompt: You have placed an ante bet of $$${amount}!
skip_pair_plus_prompt: Insufficient balance for Pair Plus bet. Pair Plus has been skipped.
has_placed_pair_plus_prompt: You have placed a Pair Plus bet of $$${amount}!
no_pair_plus_prompt: You have skipped the Pair Plus bet!
place_play_bet_prompt: You chose to compare cards! Call bet $$${amount}
draw_card_prompt: Please press Enter to draw cards
dealer_drew_card_message: Dealer drew a card from the deck
win_ante_bonus_prompt: Congratulations! You won the ante bonus $$${amount}!
win_pair_plus_prompt: Your Pair Plus bet won $$${amount} chips!
had_pair_plus_bet_but_no_pair_plus: Unfortunately, you don't have a Pair Plus qualifying hand!
push: Push! Your ante and play bets have been returned!
